requirement.clarified: Fix 7 critical UI/UX issues: (1) Attraction Types pie chart still showing duplicate slices for same categories, (2) Budget Breakdown charts not opening drawer with detailed data and filter options, (3) Raw English category names like 'mountain/observation deck/tourist attraction' displayed instead of friendly Chinese labels, (4) Top 4 stats cards should be expandable/collapsible to show detailed breakdown, (5) Duplicate content appearing across multiple pages/tabs, (6) Map service links (Google/Gaode/RedNote) should use brand logos instead of just colored buttons, (7) Timeline and Cities tabs showing identical content instead of different views
requirement.what: 7 UI/UX fixes: chart aggregation, drawer functionality, localization, expandable stats, duplicate removal, logo integration, tab differentiation
requirement.why: User reported multiple serious UX issues in v14 HTML that make the interface unusable or confusing

included: Fix Attraction Types pie chart category aggregation (ISSUE-1)
Fix Budget Breakdown drawer not showing for all charts (ISSUE-2)
Replace raw English category names with formatted Chinese labels (ISSUE-3)
Make top 4 stats cards expandable with detailed data (ISSUE-4)
Replace colored buttons with brand logo icons for map services (ISSUE-6)
Differentiate Timeline and Cities tab content (ISSUE-7)

success_criteria: SC1: Attraction Types pie chart shows one slice per unique category (no duplicates)
SC2: All Budget Breakdown charts open drawer with filterable/sortable data on click
SC3: All category labels display friendly Chinese names, not raw English
SC4: Top 4 stats cards are clickable and expand to show detailed breakdown
SC5: Each tab shows unique content with no duplicate sections
SC6: Map service links show brand logo icons (Font Awesome or inline SVG)
SC7: Timeline tab shows day-by-day timeline, Cities tab shows city clusters
constraints: Use Font Awesome for icons where possible

issue_1_chart_aggregation.symptom: Attraction Types pie chart still shows duplicate slices for same categories
issue_1_chart_aggregation.root_cause: Previous fix in commit 41f1017 added .toString().trim().toLowerCase() but may not handle all edge cases (undefined, null, whitespace variations)
issue_1_chart_aggregation.why_introduced: Aggregation logic assumes clean data, doesn't handle all data quality issues
issue_1_chart_aggregation.why_problematic: Users see confusing duplicate slices that should be merged

issue_2_drawer_missing.symptom: Budget Breakdown charts don't open drawer with detailed data
issue_2_drawer_missing.root_cause: Only some charts have onClick handlers calling openDataDrawer(), others use showDetailPanel() or have no handler
issue_2_drawer_missing.root_cause_commit: 41f1017 - drawer implementation incomplete for all charts
issue_2_drawer_missing.why_introduced: Drawer implementation was added incrementally, not systematically to all charts
issue_2_drawer_missing.why_problematic: Inconsistent UX - some charts clickable, others not

issue_3_raw_english_labels.symptom: Category names display as 'mountain / observation deck / tourist attraction' instead of Chinese
issue_3_raw_english_labels.root_cause: formatCategoryLabel() function may not cover all category types or defaults to raw English
issue_3_raw_english_labels.why_introduced: Localization mapping incomplete for all category values
issue_3_raw_english_labels.why_problematic: English labels confusing for Chinese-speaking users

issue_4_stats_not_expandable.symptom: Top 4 stats cards are static, can't expand to see details
issue_4_stats_not_expandable.root_cause: Stats cards render as pure display elements with no click handlers
issue_4_stats_not_expandable.root_cause_commit: Original implementation never included expandable stats feature
issue_4_stats_not_expandable.why_introduced: Stats designed as summary only, not interactive
issue_4_stats_not_expandable.why_problematic: Users want to drill down from summary stats to detailed data

issue_5_duplicate_content.root_cause: Tab rendering may reuse same content rendering functions without differentiation
issue_5_duplicate_content.root_cause_commit: Tab system implementation doesn't properly separate content
issue_5_duplicate_content.why_introduced: Content rendering shared across tabs without proper filtering

issue_6_no_logo_icons.symptom: Map service links are colored buttons without logo icons
issue_6_no_logo_icons.root_cause: Links use background colors only (#52C41A, #4285f4, #ff2442) without icon/logo
issue_6_no_logo_icons.root_cause_commit: Previous fix changed colors but didn't add logos
issue_6_no_logo_icons.why_introduced: Quick fix focused on color accuracy, not UX improvement

issue_7_timeline_cities_identical.symptom: Timeline and Cities tabs show identical content
issue_7_timeline_cities_identical.root_cause: Both tabs may call same rendering function or show same bash features
issue_7_timeline_cities_identical.root_cause_commit: Tab content mapping incorrect in switchTab() function
issue_7_timeline_cities_identical.why_introduced: Tab content not properly differentiated during implementation
issue_7_timeline_cities_identical.why_problematic: Redundant tabs confuse users, waste screen space

recent_commits: Previous /dev session added drawer system, but incomplete

development_approach.strategy: Fix all 7 issues systematically in html_generator.py, generate v15 HTML, test and deploy

phase_1_chart_fixes.issue_1: Strengthen category normalization: handle null/undefined, trim all whitespace, normalize to consistent format before aggregation
phase_1_chart_fixes.issue_2: Add comprehensive onClick handlers to ALL charts calling openDataDrawer() with proper data formatting
phase_1_chart_fixes.issue_3: Expand formatCategoryLabel() mapping to cover all category types with Chinese translations

phase_2_interactive_features.issue_4: Make stats cards clickable: add onClick handlers that open drawer with detailed breakdown (e.g., Total Budget → daily budget list)
phase_2_interactive_features.issue_6: Add brand logo icons: Use Font Awesome icons for Google/RedNote, custom SVG or FA icon for Gaode

phase_3_content_deduplication.issue_5: Audit all tab content rendering, identify duplicates, separate unique content for each tab
phase_3_content_deduplication.issue_7: Differentiate Timeline (renderRouteKanbanBash) vs Cities (renderCitiesGeographicBash) tab content

changes: Fix attraction type aggregation with robust normalization (issue 1)
Add onClick handlers to all Budget Breakdown charts (issue 2)
Make stats cards expandable with click handlers (issue 4)
Add brand logo icons to map links (issue 6)
Separate Timeline and Cities tab content (issue 7)

development_approach.validation_approach: Generate v15 HTML, verify: (1) Pie chart has no duplicates, (2) All charts open drawer, (3) No English category names visible, (4) Stats cards expand, (5) No duplicate content, (6) Logo icons visible, (7) Timeline ≠ Cities
